title: FoodFlow AI — Food Waste Supply Chain Dataset
subtitle: 2-year synthetic food retail dataset for demand forecasting & waste reduction
description:
Realistic synthetic dataset simulating 2 years (2024-2025) of food retail supply chain operations across 3 cities, 15 locations, 148 products, and 400K+ transactions. Includes weather, events, inventory expiry tracking, and CO₂ footprint data. Built for demand prediction, waste cascade optimization, and route planning ML tasks.

Generated with random seed: 77777

### Raw Tables
- **products**: 148 rows
- **stores**: 15 rows
- **suppliers**: 20 rows
- **supplier_products**: 512 rows
- **weather**: 2,193 rows
- **events**: 175 rows
- **sales**: 401,726 rows
- **inventory**: 16,882 rows

### Analytics Views
- daily_store_sales, product_waste_analysis, weekly_category_trends
- store_performance, weather_impact, perishable_risk_matrix
- monthly_waste_by_category, event_impact_analysis
- carbon_footprint_summary, demand_forecasting_features
